SD

Scott Devereaux

Background Investigations Lead

Scott Devereaux leads MILLERGROUP's background investigation division, bringing extensive experience in due diligence, surveillance operations, and protective intelligence. His meticulous approach to investigation ensures clients receive comprehensive and actionable intelligence.

Investigation Expertise

Scott specializes in complex background investigations for corporate clients, law firms, and high-net-worth individuals. His due diligence work includes pre-employment screening, business partner vetting, and comprehensive background research for sensitive transactions.

Surveillance Operations

With years of surveillance experience, Scott has conducted operations in diverse environments and challenging conditions. His technical proficiency and attention to detail have made him a trusted resource for cases requiring discreet observation and intelligence gathering.

Protective Intelligence

Scott has provided protective intelligence support for executive protection details, combining threat assessment with proactive investigation. His work in this area includes advance work, route planning, and intelligence gathering to support security operations.

Areas of Focus

  • Corporate Due Diligence
  • Pre-Employment Background Screening
  • Security Consulting
  • Protective Intelligence
  • Asset Searches & Verification
  • Litigation Support Investigation

Client Service

Scott is known for his clear communication and thorough reporting. He works closely with clients to understand their investigation objectives and delivers detailed findings that support informed decision-making.
